title: Tempted by a Latin Lover
description: Mia is taking a much needed break from her mundane life as a Washington political journalist. She has not had a romantic love interest since being jilted at the altar three years before, something she never got over. Her vacation to Cancun, Mexico is suppose to be one of idle relaxation. That is until she gets a mysterious note on the door to her villa inviting her to the room of a gorgeous Latin man. Will this mysterious man change Mia's life forever?
author: J.D. Anders
